Package tnote.logic

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommandAdd
    This class maintains the logic of how a task is added based on sorted String inputs in an ArrayList It modifies an instance of a created TaskFile object according to information provided.
    CommandAddTest  
    CommandDelete
    This class maintains the logic of how a task is deleted based on a String input containing the task name in an ArrayList it determines whether the task to be deleted is recurring or not,calls storage to delete the task before returning the deleted TaskFile object back to UI
    CommandDeleteTest  
    CommandEdit
    This class maintains the logic of how a task is edited based on sorted String inputs in an ArrayList, giving the name and what is to be edited It differentiates between recurring task and non recurring task, and modifies it based on the provided information It calls storage to modify the information, returns the modified Task
    CommandEditTest  
    CommandSearch
    This class maintains the logic of how tasks are searched for based on String inputs in an ArrayList It searches for task with the same name or containing the letter and/or phrase within the task name and returns the TaskFile object back
    CommandSearchTest  
    CommandView
    This class maintains the logic of how various task are viewed on the GUI It filters out task according to their own information and returns a list of tasks with the same information
    CommandViewTest  
    LogicCommand  
    TNotesLogic
    This class manages what methods are called by the UI component It maintains a stack of objects of all the commands entered as well as their accompanying TaskFile Object, so that the command can be undone or redone It provides methods to call the various different methods in the subclasses, based on what is parsed from the parser Tasks can be added, deleted, edited, viewed, searched and sorted by name
    TNotesLogicTest
